sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' function OrderItem({order, token, getter, updater}) { const {id, name, count, complete} = order; const key = id + 'OrderItem'; const comp = (trueCase, falseCase) => (complete === 1) ? trueCase : falseCase; return (
  • {id}. {name}
    {count} Product{(count === 1)?'s':''}
    {comp('','Not')} Complete
    updater(token(), id, comp(0, 1))} title="Mark Complete" className={`fa fa-circle-${comp('minus','check')} text-${comp('danger','success')} c-pointer me-2`}> getter(token(), id)} className='fa fa-info-circle text-info c-pointer'>
    • ) } export default OrderItem
